content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please watch a short video that will walk you through the grid view so you can start off with Radar in no time:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=VRql7GoK\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
